deposit(uint256).details: Transfers ERC20 from sender to lockbox, mints xERC20 to sender

depositTo(address,uint256).details: Transfers ERC20 from sender to lockbox, mints xERC20 to recipient

params.to: Address to receive the minted xERC20 tokens

withdraw(uint256).details: Burns xERC20 from sender, transfers ERC20 to sender

withdrawTo(address,uint256).details: Burns xERC20 from sender, transfers ERC20 to recipient

params.to: Address to receive the withdrawn ERC20 tokens

ERC20().notice: Returns the address of the underlying ERC20 token

XERC20().notice: Returns the address of the xERC20 token

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposits ERC20 tokens and mints equivalent xERC20 tokens

depositTo(address,uint256).notice: Deposits ERC20 tokens and mints xERC20 to a specified address

withdraw(uint256).notice: Burns xERC20 tokens and withdraws equivalent ERC20 tokens

withdrawTo(address,uint256).notice: Burns xERC20 tokens and withdraws ERC20 to a specified address
